features.title: The 8 key features of Havitam
features.subtitle: Boost your business with simple, fast and intelligent tools

feature1.title: Quotes & invoices in 1 click
feature1.description: Create your quotes and invoices in seconds with an ultra-intuitive interface. Quick customization included.

feature2.title: Real-time tracking & instant signature
feature2.description: Track the status of your quotes, send them and have them signed online. Same for your invoices: sent, viewed, paid — everything is tracked.

feature3.title: Automatic payment reminders
feature3.description: Reduce delays: send automated reminders before and after the due date. Less stress, more cash flow.

feature4.title: Centralized client & document management
feature4.description: All your data (clients, quotes, invoices, payments) is organized and accessible from a single dashboard.

feature5.title: Automatic qualified lead reception
feature5.description: Receive project requests in your geographic area according to your specialties. Respond with a quote in 1 click, or move to the next.

feature6.title: Voice-dictated quotes (New)
feature6.description: Save tons of time by dictating your quotes by voice. Our voice assistant writes them for you, instantly.

feature7.title: AI-powered intelligent pricing (Beta)
feature7.description: An AI helps you estimate your rates based on the market, your previous quotes, and client type. More accuracy, more conversions.

feature8.title: Quote analysis & AI recommendations (Beta)
feature8.description: Receive automatic feedback on each quote: too expensive? too long? incomplete? AI guides you to optimize it before sending.

services.title: Recovery & Credit Insurance
services.subtitle: Secure your revenue, focus on your trade

recovery.title: Professional Recovery – €0 without results
recovery.bullet1: In case of unpaid invoice, we launch the procedures on your behalf
recovery.bullet2: Amicable and legal procedures managed by our specialized partners
recovery.bullet3: 100% free as long as no amount is recovered
recovery.bullet4: Commission from 4% on the recovered amount
recovery.bullet5: Automatic notification as soon as a delay is detected
recovery.bullet6: You stay focused on your sites, we take care of the rest

insurance.title: Credit Insurance – Guaranteed B2B Invoices
insurance.description: Service offered through our certified partner
insurance.bullet1: Assessment of B2B client solvency before quote validation
insurance.bullet2: Activate the guarantee with one click from your dashboard
insurance.bullet3: In case of non-payment, up to 90% of the invoice covered
insurance.bullet4: Intelligent system that alerts on at-risk clients
insurance.bullet5: Real-time tracking of guarantees, reimbursements and risks
